Key Match Events: Brayan Bello threw eight shutout innings
Tyler O'Neill cranked a two-run homer as the Boston Red Sox blanked the Toronto Blue Jays 3-0
Pre-Game Insights: Bowden Francis has been one of the best pitchers in baseball this month
Francis is coming off a near-no-hitter last Saturday against the Los Angeles Angels
The Red Sox start struggling righty Kutter Crawford, who has a 7.30 ERA in five starts in August
Post-Match Reflections: The Blue Jays were blanked 3-0 on Wednesday after losing 6-3 on Tuesday against their AL East rival
Miscellaneous Highlights: This was the second game in a row the Blue Jays lost to the Red Sox
Bowden Francis has a 1.32 ERA in five games (four starts) this month
Others: The Toronto Blue Jays right-hander hopes to finish August strong when he takes the mound for the series finale against the Boston Red Sox at Fenway Park on Thursday night
